author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 8:00 PM HST Fri Aug 23
 the center of Hone was located near 17.2, -149.9
 with movement W at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
